text: Deenei laa, i dagu hai nia mee aanei i di tonu, dela gadoo dagu hai dela e dadaahi dagu hagababa ang gi Jacob mo ang gi dagu hege go David. Au gaa hili aga dagu dangada e dahi mai i di madawaawa David belee dagi nia hagadili o Abraham, Isaac mo Jacob. Au ga dumaalia gi agu daangada ga haga maluagina digaula labelaa.”
